    • addMenuItem

      public String addMenuItem(String name, double price, item_type type, ArrayList<String> ingredients, ArrayList<Integer> quantities)
      add new menu item with given ingredients (and their quantities) to the database
      Parameters:
      name - the new name (must be unique)
      price - the new price
      type - the item type
      ingredients - an ArrayList of ingredients. If an ingredient does not already exist, it will be added
      quantities - the quantity of each ingredient
      Returns:
      an empty string if successful, the error message reached if unsuccessful

      public ArrayList<InventoryItem> getRestockReport()

      Returns:
      An arraylist of inventory items that satisfies the conditions(empty if none satisfy the condition)

    • getExcessReport

      public ArrayList<excessReportTuple> getExcessReport(LocalDate startDate)
      Get the names of each inventory item for which less than 10% of its stock was consumed since the date given To create a date for the function (February 14th works well) LocalDate date = LocalDate.of(2023, 2, 14);
      Parameters:
      startDate -
      Returns:
      list of inventory item names

    • getFrequencyPairs

      public ArrayList<String> getFrequencyPairs(int startHour, int startMinute, int startSecond, int endHour, int endMinute, int endSecond)
      Gets the most frequent pairs of itemIDs in a time range
      Returns:
      an arraylist of the strings of the top 10 most popular, ties broken randomly
